insert.foreach:
insert into t_goods_shop
user_id,
category_id,
subject_type,
logo,
title,
intro,
level,
check_status,
check_description,

mapper.delete:
delete from t_goods_shop where id in
#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_goods_shop
user_id = #{userId},
category_id = #{categoryId},
subject_type = #{subjectType},
logo = #{logo},
title = #{title},
intro = #{intro},
level = #{level},
check_status = #{checkStatus},
check_description = #{checkDescription},
checked_user_id = #{checkedUserId},
checked_time = #{checkedTime},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_active = #{isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id} and version + 1 <= #{version}

update.foreach:
update t_goods_shop
user_id = #{item.userId},
category_id = #{item.categoryId},
subject_type = #{item.subjectType},
logo = #{item.logo},
title = #{item.title},
intro = #{item.intro},
level = #{item.level},
check_status = #{item.checkStatus},
check_description = #{item.checkDescription},
checked_user_id = #{item.checkedUserId},
checked_time = #{item.checkedTime},
version = #{item.version},
create_time = #{item.createTime},
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
is_active = #{item.isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
version = version + 1,
where id = #{item.id}

mapper.sql: id as id, user_id as userId, category_id as categoryId, subject_type as subjectType, logo as logo, title as title, intro as intro, level as level, check_status as checkStatus, check_description as checkDescription, checked_user_id as checkedUserId, checked_time as checkedTime, version as version, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_active as isActive
